# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of a [half-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var FLOAT16_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float16-num-bytes' );
```

#### FLOAT16_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of a [half-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

``` javascript
FLOAT16_NUM_BYTES === 2;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var FLOAT16_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float16-num-bytes' );

console.log( FLOAT16_NUM_BYTES );
// => 2
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
